caption.p: Temporal changes of the annual water discharge ( a), sediment discharges ( b) and suspended sediment concentration ( c) in the Yangtze River, annual average wind speed ( d) and significant wave height ( e) at Sheshan station, and annual mean sea level (above the Astronomic Lowest Tide) in the Northern East China Sea ( f). The location of Sheshan station was noted in Fig.Â 1b. WD: water discharge, SD: sediment discharge, SSC: suspended sediment concentration, WS: wind speed, WH: wave height and MSL: mean sea level.
